What's ASCII code for the word "password"?

I was updating the welcome message sent to all new members when I came 
across a no profanity allowed message and discovered the word 
"password" is considered profanity by Yahoo Groups in a welcome 
message.  I wish I was kidding.  To get around that, I have been 
advised to try ascii code. [ASCII code was used to allow a group 
description to say "No pornography allowed".]
